elements.label: 干员
elements.description: Student, helpmeet, defender, champion, dupe, sacrifice... companion.

elements.label: 原料
elements.description: 燃料、药膏、颜料以及耐心：全都随时间耗减。
elements.comments: This is so anything that generates Funds will always trigger the needs timer if it's not already running.

elements.label: 刃
elements.description: 古人用兵器刺人而杀之，说：“非我也，刃也。”你很快会明白，这话说得没错。 [刃是关于搏杀、叛逆与争斗的力量。]

elements.label: 铸
elements.description: 铸庄严，沉重，不可撼动。[铸是关于坚守、毁灭与捍卫的力量。]

elements.label: 杯
elements.description: 传说圣子被钉死时，人们用他的餐杯去盛血。当满溢时，杯中淌出了泉与酒。[杯是关于治愈、祝福与救赎的力量。]

elements.label: 心
elements.description: 心是常开不败的花朵。听吧。藏匿在黑暗深邃的土壤里、它正在跳动。[心是生命的化身。心是关于激振、擢升与续存的力量。]

elements.label: 启
elements.description: 万物间皆存在联系。万物皆为一体。启是钥匙，而万物是一把锁。 [启是关于连接、拆分与瓦解的力量。它介于诸法则之中。]

elements.label: 灯
elements.description: 父创造我。我澄澈如镜与窗。我为容器。容器中照进光。[灯是关于明识穷达、洞若观火与心无二用的力量。]

elements.label: 蛾
elements.description: 生命畏惧源石、就如同畏惧火。这是自然之理。可灰烬告诉我们，有一种生命的巡礼是越过死亡的。[法术与源石的结合是危险而野蛮的，如同飞蛾扑火。蛾是源自于追逐、拥抱与奋不顾身的力量。]

elements.label: 冬
elements.description: “岁寒，然后知松柏之后凋也。”有一种人知晓。此谓之冬。 [冬是在模糊的生与死交界的边缘处使用的力量。它几乎不能被称之为一种力量，因为它的主人往往不一定能掌握。]

elements.label: 能力
elements.description: 对我来说，就是使用理智的才能。

elements.label: 回忆
elements.description: 我们铭记死者，直至将其遗忘。

elements.label: 天灾
elements.description: 源石引发的各种灾害。

elements.label: 崇敬：特蕾西娅
elements.description: 该组织崇敬特蕾西娅之准则，我们以无罪女王之名贯彻她的遗志。

elements.label: 礼物
elements.description: 也许可以展现诚意。

elements.label: 藏宝地
elements.description: 藏有一些珍贵之物。

elements.label: 指引
elements.description: 一幅地图，几句提示，前往某处的指引。

elements.label: 秘密
elements.description: 水面下的某物。

elements.label: 食物
elements.description: 食物，能量。[使用可恢复理智]

elements.label: 地点
elements.description: 一切事物皆有其所在之处，如此物位于此处。

elements.label: 位置
elements.description: 这片大地上遥远的某处。

elements.label: 理智欠损
elements.description: 也许我可以吃点东西，恢复理智。

elements.label: Acquaintance
elements.description: Not yet a friend, nor yet an enemy.

elements.label: Maverick
elements.description: A student of the invisible arts, with an agenda of their own.

elements.label: Benefactor
elements.description: An aficionado of my work, with whom I have grown close.

elements.label: Follower
elements.description: Student, helpmeet, defender, champion, dupe, sacrifice... companion.

elements.label: Hireling
elements.description: I have negotiated this one's service, for a little while.

elements.label: Disciple
elements.description: A true initiate of the mysteries.

elements.label: Devotee
elements.description: Just now, this one's devotion is all-consuming. But soon it may fade, and then they may question what they have done.

elements.label: Exalted
elements.description: This one cannot rise higher... at least, not while I lead.

elements.label: Prisoner
elements.description: I have this one in the palm of my hand.

elements.label: Hunter
elements.description: The laws of civilisation are younger than the Laws of the Hours, but they, too, sometimes require a sacrifice. This one is an agent of the law.

elements.label: Patron
elements.description: A figure of note in the circles where I move.

elements.label: Approval
elements.description: Someone looks on me with increasing approval.

elements.label: Tutor
elements.description: This one has knowledge of value.

elements.label: Annoyance
elements.description: Here is a thorn in my side. I may yet find a way to remove it.

elements.label: Sending
elements.description: Not exactly me, but not exactly something else.

elements.label: Secret Histories
elements.description: History is the scar on the world's skin. [Secret Histories describe the unknown complexities of the world, and its many pasts.]

elements.label: Scar
elements.description: The irrevocable outcome of an irrevocable act.

elements.label: Advancement
elements.description: A taste of what might be. [With enough of these cards, you can grow an Ability.]

elements.label: Potential
elements.description: The mark of greatness? [In the right circumstances, this follower might become even more powerful.]

elements.label: r_job
elements.description: An arrangement to exchange one's life for money.

elements.label: Dance
elements.description: Older than language, younger than life.

elements.label: A Place at the Ecdysis Club
elements.description: I have won a place on the stage of the Ecdysis Club.

elements.label: Demotion
elements.description: I have spent too long away from work.

elements.label: Rite
elements.description: 'The proper things, in the proper manner, in the proper order. God help us all.' - attributed to Hersault. [A Rite allows you to combine aspects to perform a summoning.]

elements.label: Society
elements.description: To recruit believers, I must build something for them to believe.

elements.label: Uncertain
elements.description: This organisation has begun to question its tenets. I could apply pressure to alter its direction.

elements.label: Pigment
elements.description: It might be possible to apply this to canvas.

elements.label: Lethal Poison
elements.description: Under no circumstances should you put this in anyone you want to keep.

elements.label: Influence
elements.description: An echo, a resonance, an alignment. Something that will fade soon.

elements.label: Tool
elements.description: 'A sword does not kill; it is an instrument in the hand of the killer.' - Seneca the Younger

elements.label: A Mirror
elements.description: Crack light's skin, and light will bleed.

elements.label: Riddle
elements.description: Some questions have only one answer. Some have no answer at all.

elements.label: Reputation
elements.description: 'Many fear their reputation, few their conscience.' - Pliny

elements.label: Evidence Level
elements.description: Some forms of proof are stronger than others.

elements.label: Suspicious
elements.description: A detective may wish to investigate this.

elements.label: Strength
elements.description: I am strong by day as well as by night. [This may allow you to perform better as a manual labourer, or as a dancer.]

elements.label: Dangerous
elements.description: Direct confrontation is always unwise. But in the last resort, if it comes to a struggle, I am very dangerous.

elements.label: Imagination
elements.description: My skull roils with visions. [This may allow you create more ambitious paintings.]

elements.label: Scholarship
elements.description: I am a pillar of wisdoms. [This currently only allows you to increase Reason further.]

elements.label: A Way Back Through Dream
elements.description: Some memories are sketch-maps of dream. Some even pass through the Bounds of dream, to the Wood and the House that rises above it.

elements.label: Desire
elements.description: My ultimate aim. There will be a price.

elements.label: Promise
elements.description: A commitment to a conclusion.

elements.label: A Rival's Ascension
elements.description: Opportunities to ascend to the House of the Sun are rare. If another achieves it, I may miss my chance. [If this reaches seven, your Rival has a chance to win the game instead of you at the next Season of Ambitions.]

elements.label: The Forms of Change
elements.description: Each time I change, I leave something behind.

elements.label: The Marks of Shaping
elements.description: I may seek immortality and power in the Hour called the Forge of Days. Her touch brings particular appetites, and Marks.

elements.label: The Marks of Delight
elements.description: I may seek immortality and delight in the Hour called the Red Grail. Her touch brings particular appetites, and Marks.

elements.label: The Marks of Light
elements.description: I may seek immortality and enlightenment in the Hour called the Watchman. His touch brings particular appetites, and Marks.

elements.label: The Claws of Memory
elements.description: Beneath the soil, bones. In the bones, memory. In the memory, colours.
elements.comments: Important! this is used to trigger the extra corpse-remnants discovery from Expeditions for Ghoul

elements.label: Ascending
elements.description: To the next Mark.

elements.label: Descending
elements.description: If I don't feed my new appetites, my Marks will fade.

elements.label: Article
elements.description: An original work on a particular topic.

elements.label: Text
elements.description: Books are the memory which does not die.

elements.label: Legacy Item
elements.comments: Used for plot items that shouldn't be passed down to another legacy through LEVER_LastBook, since they can break flows.

elements.label: Autographed
elements.description: Marked by its maker.

elements.label: Lore
elements.description: Knowledge of the invisible arts. I can use it to attract followers, to perform rites, to open the way to the Mansus, to seek my ascension... [Lore fragments can sometimes be upgraded with Study, and with matching fragments.]

elements.label: A Language
elements.description: This is useful for translating texts.

elements.label: Latin Scholar
elements.description: A scholar of Latin who might be prepared to tutor you if you study with them.

elements.label: Greek Scholar
elements.description: A scholar of Greek who might be prepared to tutor you if you study with them.

elements.label: Aramaic Scholar
elements.description: A scholar of Aramaic who might be prepared to tutor you if you study with them.

elements.label: Sanskrit Scholar
elements.description: A scholar of Sanskrit who might be prepared to tutor you if you study with them.

elements.label: Fucine Speaker
elements.description: This spirit may be able to teach you Fucine, if you know a related tongue.

elements.label: Phrygian Speaker
elements.description: This spirit may be able to teach you Phrygian, if you know a related tongue.

elements.label: Mandaic Speaker
elements.description: This spirit may be able to teach you Deep Mandaic, if you know a related tongue.

elements.label: Phylaxian
elements.description: If I speak with this one about my Health, it can offer protection against disease.

elements.label: Lamp of Loss
elements.description: If I speak to this one, I could offer it my Passion.

elements.label: Thresher of Thoughts
elements.description: If I speak to this one, I could offer it my Reason.

elements.label: Auctionable
elements.description: I might be able to auction this, although value at auction is always uncertain.

elements.label: Spintria Value
elements.description: Spintriae are the currency of the hidden world. Some spintriae are worth more than others. But don't expect to get change. This is not a grocery.

elements.label: Headquarters
elements.description: For conversation and convocation.

elements.label: Move to a New HQ
elements.description: Recipe aspect

elements.label: Library
elements.description: A collection of minor volumes, partial copies and ephemera that may help with research.

elements.label: Pit
elements.description: A lightless well of solitude where I may experience grim insights.

elements.label: Sanctuary
elements.description: A space designed for contemplation and perhaps even peace.

elements.label: In the Capital
elements.description: A secret place in the teeming capital city where I live.

elements.label: In the Shires
elements.description: Green fields and grey hills.

elements.label: On the Continent
elements.description: Across a narrow sea, in unsuspected corners of rival nations.

elements.label: In the Land Beyond the Forest
elements.description: Misty passes and remote villages, where the world's skin is thin.

elements.label: In the Rending Mountains
elements.description: Tawny-flanked, snow-tipped, far from help.

elements.label: The Lone and Level Sands
elements.description: In a dry and distant place, dune-chained horizons await you.

elements.label: Among the Evening Isles
elements.description: Wave-washed chains of rocky islands vibrant with green life.

elements.label: Peril
elements.description: An obstacle, a danger, or a premature conclusion.

elements.label: Curse
elements.description: A malign influence you must defeat.

elements.label: Guardian
elements.description: An entity that has been charged with preventing entry.

elements.label: Seal
elements.description: Your progress is prevented.

elements.label: Requires Knowledge
elements.description: This is a puzzle with missing pieces. I might find those pieces in odd corners of scholarship. [To upgrade or subvert this Fragment, you'd need Erudition, or an HQ with a Library.]

elements.label: Requires Intuition
elements.description: With time and peace, answers sometimes come unannounced. [To upgrade or subvert this Fragment, you'd need Glimmerings, or an HQ with a Sanctuary.]

elements.label: Requires a Grim Lesson
elements.description: I'll learn. [To upgrade or subvert this Fragment, you'd need Dread (which might breed), the Silent Intensity skill, or an HQ with a Pit.]

elements.label: Requires Obsessive Research
elements.description: This subject demands more attention than is safe. [To upgrade or subvert this Fragment, you'd need an HQ with a Library, the Never-No skill, or a Reason. There's a very small risk your Reason might be permanently damaged.]

elements.label: Requires a Paradoxical Resolution
elements.description: Truth is a serpent. Answers feed its appetites. [To upgrade or subvert this Fragment, you'd need an HQ with a Sanctuary, the Open Soul skill, or a Passion. There's a very small risk your Passion might be permanently damaged.]

elements.label: Requires Illumination
elements.description: Water fills the cup; light fills the mind. [To upgrade or subvert this Fragment, you'd need Fascination (which might breed), an HQ with a Library, or the Rarefied Mind skill.]

elements.label: Requires Practical Experimentation
elements.description: Pain is only what happens now; knowledge is what we will remember. [To upgrade or subvert this Fragment, you'd need to risk your Health or use a Prisoner.]

elements.label: Summoned
elements.description: This one is not from here.

elements.label: Ill Health
elements.description: Perhaps I can rest, and recover.

elements.label: Induces Despair
elements.description: This may cause Despair.

elements.label: Induces Visions
elements.description: I may see things.

elements.label: Commission Given
elements.description: A task awaits your attention.

elements.label: Commission Fulfilled
elements.description: You have completed a task.

elements.label: Recruiting
elements.description: To see the light, one cannot be blind; but sometimes, it's the light that blinds us.

elements.label: Hiring
elements.description: Extend a hireling's period of service.
elements.comments: Recipe aspect. Use to rehire hirelings.

elements.label: Refiring
elements.description: Extend a d's period of service.
elements.comments: Recipe aspect. Use to refire devotees.

elements.label: Promotion
elements.description: Time to take the deeper oaths.

elements.label: Exaltation: Edge
elements.description: These are the true mysteries of our veneration.

elements.label: Exaltation: Forge
elements.description: These are the true mysteries of our veneration.

elements.label: Exaltation: Grail
elements.description: These are the true mysteries of our veneration.

elements.label: Exaltation: Heart
elements.description: These are the true mysteries of our veneration.

elements.label: Exaltation: Knock
elements.description: These are the true mysteries of our veneration.

elements.label: Exaltation: Lantern
elements.description: These are the true mysteries of our veneration.

elements.label: Exaltation: Moth
elements.description: These are the true mysteries of our veneration.

elements.label: Exaltation: Winter
elements.description: These are the true mysteries of our veneration.

elements.label: A Commitment is Made
elements.description: Something has occurred.
elements.comments: Recipe aspect; runs to fatigue stats, or to convert situation-invested elements into a form that won't keep triggering a recipe that wants more of them (eg reason in Research, funds in bidding).

elements.label: Location Exhausted
elements.description: A location has been exhausted, and won't reopen unless explicitly renewed.

elements.label: Nothing has Occurred
elements.description: All is as it was
elements.comments: Recipe aspect; runs when an situation fails to convert situation control elements back to their originals.

elements.label: Decline
elements.description: Something is Ending
elements.comments: Recipe aspect; runs when we want to decay something like an investment.

elements.label: Avowal
elements.description: A Positive Change in Loyalties
elements.comments: Recipe aspect; runs when we want to flip someone's loyalties positively

elements.label: Rejection
elements.description: A Change in Loyalties
elements.comments: Recipe aspect; runs when we want to flip someone's loyalties

elements.label: Scar Ability
elements.description: Permanently converts an ability (active or exhausted) to its scar version

elements.label: Restore Health
elements.description: Health will return.

elements.label: Damage Health
elements.description: Health will be injured.

elements.label: Fall Sick
elements.description: Health will become affliction; this could also affect people potentially

elements.label: Destroy Health
elements.description: Health will be destroyed.

elements.label: Damage Reason
elements.description: Reason will become Dread.

elements.label: To Reason
elements.description: ...will become Reason.

elements.label: To Passion
elements.description: ...will become Passion.

elements.label: To Health
elements.description: ...will become Health.

elements.label: Dreadful
elements.description: Risk of generating Dread.

elements.label: Fascinating
elements.description: Risk of generating Fascination.

elements.label: Damage Passion
elements.description: Passion will become Fascination.

elements.label: Kill Mortal
elements.description: Mortals will be replaced by corpses

elements.label: Kill Long
elements.description: Long will be replaced by their rewards

elements.label: Kill Summoning
elements.description: Summonings will be replaced by flavour influences or summon blockers

elements.label: Kill Manifesting Summoning
elements.description: Summonings will be replaced by flavour influences or summon blockers

elements.label: Dissolution
elements.description: What is without, within; what is within, without. Dissolves something to an Influence.

elements.label: Transform eg a corpse to Shattered Risen
Transform eg a corpse to Burgeoning Risen
Rebellion
elements.description: Followers will become Rivals

elements.label: End Annoyance
elements.description: Annoyances like difficult bosses will be resolved.

elements.label: Career Advancement
elements.description: A promotion or skill increase

elements.label: Derange Mortal
elements.description: Mortals will be replaced by Lunatics

elements.label: Capture Hunter
elements.description: Hunters will be imprisoned.

elements.label: Kill Hunter
elements.description: Hunters will become corpses.

elements.label: Capture Follower
elements.description: Followers will be imprisoned.

elements.label: Restore Passion
elements.description: Passion will be clarified.

elements.label: Plead
elements.description: Mercy may be shown.

elements.label: Employment
elements.description: I've done a day's work.
elements.comments: Recipe aspect. Refreshes job timers and fatigues stats

elements.label: Scandalous
elements.description: I won't be easily forgotten.

elements.label: Epiphany
elements.description: My understanding's increased.

elements.label: Upgrade Influence
elements.description: I've found an alignment.

elements.label: A MOve toWards the GLory
elements.description: Converts Dread to Fascination, and potential other elements to more Gloryful equivalents.

elements.label: Depiphany
elements.description: I understand things more simply now.
elements.comments: Recipe aspect. Downgrades and splits lore.

elements.label: Investigation Success
elements.description: Upgrades evidence.

elements.label: Investigation Setback
elements.description: Downgrades evidence.

elements.label: Crack Mirrors
elements.description: Mirrors will enter their cracked state.

elements.label: Mortal
elements.description: 'The long habit of living indisposeth us for dying.' - Thomas Browne

elements.label: Commission
elements.description: An opportunity for profit. I should complete this and return it to a patron.

elements.label: Sheer Good Fortune
elements.description: How lucky I have been.

elements.label: An Ugliness
elements.description: Something unwelcome.

elements.label: Season
elements.description: Something relevant will occur, soon
elements.comments: identifies card draws for Time seasonal events

elements.label: Devourer
elements.description: If this breaks free, it may assault you, or consume your followers.

elements.label: Deceiver
elements.description: If this breaks free, it may try to drive you or your followers to insanity.

elements.label: Mystic
elements.description: This Hunter will usually survive attacks by creatures of the Mansus, even if those attacks would otherwise be unstoppable.

elements.label: Brilliant
elements.description: Brilliant Hunters find meaning in the tiniest detail. They can convert Notoriety directly into Damning Evidence.

elements.label: Erratic
elements.description: This Hunter often fails to create Evidence from Notoriety. Conversely, they'll sometimes create Evidence even when they can't find Notoriety.

elements.label: Meticulous
elements.description: This Hunter always succeeds at creating Evidence from Notoriety.

elements.label: Tenacious
elements.description: This Hunter will survive perhaps one physical assault in three, even when the attack would otherwise be unstoppable.

elements.label: Wary
elements.description: This one has grown cautious. They will not meet with me in person again.

elements.label: Grim
elements.description: Grim Hunters cannot be swayed by the allure of the Glory... but their own despair may destroy them.

elements.label: Idealist
elements.description: Idealists cannot be demoralised - although sometimes their ideals can be turned against them.

elements.label: Veneration: Edge
elements.description: This organisation venerates the principle called Edge, which we call upon in the name of the Colonel and the Lionsmith... among others.

elements.label: Veneration: Forge
elements.description: This organisation venerates the principle called Forge, which we call upon in the name of the Forge of Days herself and the Madrugad... among others.

elements.label: Veneration: Grail
elements.description: This organisation venerates the principle called Grail, which we call upon in the name of the Red Grail herself and the Sister-and-Witch... among others.

elements.label: Veneration: Heart
elements.description: This organisation venerates the principle called Heart, which we call upon in the name of the Thunderskin and the Velvet... among others.

elements.label: Veneration: Knock
elements.description: This organisation venerates the principle called Knock, which we call upon in the name of the Mother of Ants and the Meniscate... among others.

elements.label: Veneration: Lantern
elements.description: This organisation venerates the principle called Lantern, which we call upon in the name of the Door-in-the-Eye and the Flowermaker... among others.

elements.label: Veneration: Moth
elements.description: This organisation venerates the principle called Moth, which we call upon in the name of the Moth himself and the Witch-and-Sister... among others.

elements.label: Veneration: Winter
elements.description: This organisation venerates the principle called Winter, which we call upon in the name of the Sun-in-Rags and the Horned Axe... among others.

elements.label: Written in Latin
elements.description: A dead language: dead as diamonds. [Some books must be translated before they can be read.]

elements.label: Written in Fucine
elements.description: A people lived east of the lost lake Fucino. Horace warned that theirs was the land of witches. This was their language, called by some 'the dry tongue' and by others 'the tongue of witches'. [Some books must be translated before they can be read.]

elements.label: Written in Greek
elements.description: A tongue for philosophers, theologians and heroes. [Some books must be translated before they can be read.]

elements.label: Written in Phrygian
elements.description: The Phrygians worshipped the Great Mother, who we call the Grail. Theirs was the land in which the Sisterhood of the Knot was born, and this is the tongue in which the Thunderskin pleaded, at his ascension. [Some books must be translated before they can be read.]

elements.label: Written in Aramaic
elements.description: The language of Aram, and all her many children these three thousand years and more. [Some books must be translated before they can be read.]

elements.label: Written in Deep Mandaic
elements.description: The most secret script of the innermost rites of the deep sects of the deep desert. The birth-tongue, it is claimed, of the Mother of Ants herself. [Some books must be translated before they can be read.]

elements.label: Written in Sanskrit
elements.description: The holy tongue of the Subcontinent. The door to four thousand years of poetry, ceremony and mystery now opens before you, if you can struggle through the lotus convolutions of its vocabulary. [Some books must be translated before they can be read.]

elements.label: Written in Vak
elements.description: Before gods arose from blood, before ever ape stood upright, this was the language heard in the House of the Sun.[Some books must be translated before they can be read.]

elements.label: Honoured
elements.description: I have honoured this follower with a gift.

elements.label: Interested
elements.description: This is someone who has developed a romantic interest in me.

elements.label: Wound
elements.description: Is it possible for Long to die? Let's put it to the test.

elements.label: Wound
elements.description: This one has suffered in my service. [Wounded Followers don't count as Followers, and can't be used as agents or assistants. They may die in the Season of Sickness. Use Talk to treat them.]

elements.label: Scar: Brutal Experience
elements.description: FAUSTUS: I think Hell's a fable. MEPHISTOPHILIS: Ay, think so still, till experience change thy mind. [Three Scars of the same type will kill a mortal.]

elements.label: Scar: Half-Healed Fistula
elements.description: Not all doors are wounds; but all wounds are doors. [Three Scars of the same type will kill a mortal.]

elements.label: Scar: Old Wound
elements.description: Step closer to the sunset, and see the first stars of night. [Three Scars of the same type will kill a mortal.]

elements.label: Old Scar
elements.description: This was someone who knew pain.

elements.label: Resentment
elements.description: Too many grievances can compromise loyalty.
elements.comments: Three resentments in the season of ambitions will turn someone Troublemaker

elements.label: Boredom
elements.description: My benefactor's interest will eventually wane.

elements.label: Besotment
elements.description: My benefactor looks fondly on me.

elements.label: A Proposal from a Benefactor
elements.description: In a moment of passion, my benefactor has proposed marriage. If I seize the moment and accept, this will transform my life... and close other doors forever. [Talk to the Benefactor before their enthusiasm wanes.]

elements.label: Old Form
elements.description: I am coming to know a dance that began in the sodden forests of the first continent.

elements.label: The New Form
elements.description: I am coming to know a dance that began beneath the mountain pines of the dry land.

elements.label: The Gentlemen at the Stage Door
elements.description: A gentleman of means sometimes attends performances. He has been known to pay his respects to chorus members after the show.

elements.label: The Lady in the Box
elements.description: A lady of means sometimes attends performances. She has been known to show a keen interest in chorus members.

elements.label: A Bright-Eyed Watcher
elements.description: Sometimes she sits in the second row, seeking new talent for her peculiar establishment. Those she employs are rarely seen about town.

elements.label: Snare Effectiveness
elements.description: Some snares are easy to escape. Some are webs of steel.

elements.label: The Chosen Compass
elements.description: Our Shaper has chosen this one to be a compass to the flaw in the world - the weak place in the place that does not change. When they find it they will surrender their eyes, and live for their Purpose.

elements.label: Thine Eyes Have Seen
elements.description: This one is blind to everything except the flaw in the world that we seek. There is one in Vienna, but there is another much closer to home, in the place whose name has always been the same, even as Caer Ys. They can lead us there, with the Dawnbreaker Core, to perform our Great Work.

elements.label: Mentor
elements.description: Our secret ruler, who commands our loyalty, who shall rise still higher through our works.

elements.label: Intention
elements.description: Our immortal enemy has a plan.

elements.label: Intention
elements.description: Our immortal enemy has a plan.

elements.label: Intention
elements.description: Our immortal enemy has a plan.

elements.label: Intention
elements.description: Our immortal enemy has a plan.

elements.label: Strategy Revealed
elements.description: This strategy's been exposed.

elements.label: Reveal Strategy
elements.description: Reveals a concealed strategy

elements.label: Reveal Inentity
elements.description: Reveals an unknown enemy

elements.label: A Lesson Learnt
elements.description: Our foe watches and learns.

elements.label: Might
elements.description: Over time, this Long will build up allies and resources in the city, improving their ability to assault us. [If it ever reaches 10, the Long will consider attacking you directly.]

elements.label: Connections
elements.description: Over time, this Long will build up their network in the city, improving their ability to intrigue against us. [If it ever reaches 10, the Long will consider attacking you directly.]

elements.label: The Size of Starlight
elements.description: Over time, this Long will learn the shape of our dreams, improving their ability to strike at us through the Mansus. [If it ever reaches 10, the Long will consider attacking you directly.]

elements.label: An Immortal Enemy
elements.description: Many Long serve the Hours. They fiercely oppose the rise of new Names, who might, just perhaps, become usurping Hours some day. Some Long hate the Hours. Their opposition to new Names is, if anything, even fiercer.

elements.label: An element of the Great Work
elements.description: When the Work is complete, our founder, our inspiration, will rise yet higher.

elements.label: Sabotaged!
elements.description: The Great Work is imperilled. [Use a Forge follower and a Silver Spintria to repair this.]

elements.label: Sabotage!
elements.description: Converts a Great Work item to an unstable version that needs fixing.

elements.label: The Sweetest
elements.description: Strawberries, cinnamon, orange-blossom.

elements.label: The Salt
elements.description: Copper, myrrh, rust.

elements.label: The Sweet
elements.description: Figs, nuts, malt.

elements.label: Vitulation Guests Upgrade
elements.description: Guests assemble!

elements.label: Cloud of Witnesses Upgrade
elements.description: Witnesses assemble!

elements.label: Exposed
elements.description: This follower's secrets have been revealed to the public. Any time they're active, the press might take an interest.

elements.label: Poisoned Passion
elements.description: My emotions have been infected with the creeping taint of fear. [Using this card anywhere will probably create Dread.]

elements.label: The Splendorous Infection
elements.description: I am teased by recurring dreams of candlefire. [Using this card anywhere will probably create Fascination.]

elements.label: The Failing Flesh
elements.description: I have become subject to pain that will never depart. [Using this card anywhere will probably create Dread.]

elements.label: The Eyes in my Memory
elements.description: The Long has sent me a sweet dream. I must not think of it. [If you Dream away this card or use it in a ritual, the Long will learn from you, increasing their power in your dreams.]

elements.label: The Teeth in my Heart
elements.description: The Long has set dreams to bedevil me. It would be safer to banish them, but wiser not to think of them. [If you Dream away this card or use it in a ritual, the Long will learn from you, increasing their power in your dreams.]

elements.label: The Way is Watched
elements.description: The Long has set a watch upon this Way. If I pass it, they'll learn more of me as I sleep.

elements.label: Lock-Scar
elements.description: Perhaps a serpent has kissed me, perhaps a knife has drunk of me, perhaps I dreamt too sharp a dream. [In a rite with a sufficient intensity of Knock, this Scar might open.]

elements.label: Open Lock-Scar
elements.description: [This Scar is opening.]

elements.label: This Scar will Open
elements.description: Recipee aspect.

elements.label: Graveyard Mouth
elements.description: Now that I have tasted the graveyard fruit, the hunger comes often to trouble me. My mouth waters at the fragrances of decay, and my belly growls like a dog. [Reduce this by feeding on Remnants. Do not ever permit it to reach seven, the game may end, and not pleasantly.]

elements.label: The Colours Seven-Coiled
elements.description: On a bed of dunes beneath a red low sun a monster wrestles itself while attendants crowd around its flanks. It is flabby and huge, the colour of dirty sulphur. Fanged tentacle-necks wrestle like kittens. It tears cheerfully at its own flesh, and the blood that flows is golden. It flops over in a cataclysm of wattled flesh, crushing a knot of attendants, and the others scream and cheer.

elements.label: The Colours Tidal
elements.description: In a night-blue Mansus-haze swims a coral palace-crown. At its fore-edge it absorbs the lesser Names, coating them with its minerals and juices, and at its rear edge it expels some of them, polished like jewels. The others go to feed its thorny Tide-heart.

elements.label: The Colours of the Double Threshold
elements.description: When I remember the Horned Axe, I recall the scent of hawthorn. I recall a purple evening sky shot with red gold. I recall that her edges dripped where she had lately been at work.

elements.label: The Colours of the Horizon
elements.description: A faded pale white-gold seen in certain patches of the sky, when the mist is clearing but the sun might be mistaken for the moon. We hold our breath and watch it brighten, until each colour divides from the next like a new-minted alphabet. The Egg Unhatching.

elements.label: The Colours that Were
elements.description: Auroral rose vies with electric blue. There is neither night nor morning but only the hours of noon anticipated and lingering noon. We each of us open our hearts to the golden needle of the sky. All colours magnified beneath the Sun-in-Splendour.

elements.label: The Colours that Turn
elements.description: With each turn its cilia pulse and wriggle and its body flushes translucent to crimson. It might be ugly but it is beautiful like the withdrawing of blood from the labyrinths of glass. It does not cease and all its involutions are infinite. The Wheel.

elements.label: The Colours That Are Not Black
elements.description: The Wood before its darkening, its fruits poison-green, its carnelian roots. The Moth's eyes are merry with hunger. He is hunting.

elements.label: The Colours of the Old Fire
elements.description: This is only a stone, though it is smoothed and sharpened to a midnight point, but look closer. Each of its facets shows a single point of light. It might be the glint of firelight. It might be each a different Star.

elements.label: The Colours that Will Be
elements.description: Our wings unfurled and shining, our scales lambent as obsidian, our eyes faceted like jewels, our claws unimpeachable dark.

elements.label: The Elegiast's Price
elements.description: The Elegiast is the Hour from whom nothing more can be taken, and the Hour who calls each of the Dead by name. Once in a long ever, for a great price, he will call one of the Dead up out of Nowhere, that they may continue, lonely, unscathed, until the date of their own final winter.

elements.label: Remnant
elements.description: Once another wore this flesh.

elements.label: Manifesting
elements.description: The spirit is entering the world. This is simpler than a birth, but not so simple as passing through a door.

elements.label: Staleness
elements.description: I have begun to repeat myself. [The higher this grows, the greater the impact on your work. Producing the very highest-quality work will gradually reduce Staleness.]

elements.label: Project
elements.description: Research project agenda
